descriptions.site_name: The name of your application displayed throughout the site
descriptions.site_logo: The URL of your site's logo used for branding
descriptions.site_favicon: Icon displayed in the browser tab
descriptions.site_description: A brief description of your site for SEO and meta tags
descriptions.site_url: The base URL of your website
descriptions.admin_email: The primary administrator email address for system notifications
descriptions.timezone: The default timezone used for all dates and times
descriptions.date_format: The format used to display dates throughout the application
descriptions.time_format: The format used to display times throughout the application
descriptions.items_per_page: The default number of items to display in table listings
descriptions.mail_driver: The protocol used to send emails (SMTP, Mailgun, etc.)
descriptions.mail_username: The username for mail server authentication
descriptions.mail_password: The password for mail server authentication
descriptions.mail_from_address: The email address shown as the sender
descriptions.mail_from_name: The name shown as the sender
descriptions.meta_title: The default title for pages when no specific title is set
descriptions.meta_description: The default meta description for SEO
descriptions.meta_keywords: Default meta keywords for the site
descriptions.google_analytics_id: Your Google Analytics measurement ID (e.g., G-XXXXXX)
descriptions.enable_sitemap: Generate and serve a sitemap.xml file automatically
descriptions.enable_robots_txt: Manage and serve a robots.txt file
descriptions.enable_registration: Allow new users to create accounts on your site
descriptions.require_email_verification: New users must verify their email before they can log in
descriptions.password_min_length: The minimum number of characters required for passwords
descriptions.password_require_uppercase: Passwords must contain at least one uppercase letter (A-Z)
descriptions.password_require_lowercase: Passwords must contain at least one lowercase letter (a-z)
descriptions.password_require_number: Passwords must contain at least one digit (0-9)
descriptions.password_require_symbol: Passwords must contain at least one symbol (!{'@'}#$%^&*...)
descriptions.enable_captcha: Show captcha verification on login and registration forms
descriptions.captcha_method: Choose the type of captcha challenge to use
descriptions.captcha_on_login: Require captcha verification on the login form
descriptions.captcha_on_register: Require captcha verification on the registration form
descriptions.login_attempts_limit: Number of failed logins allowed before temporary lockout
descriptions.block_duration_minutes: How long an IP is blocked after exceeding login limits
descriptions.enable_2fa: Enable or disable two-factor authentication system-wide
descriptions.session_lifetime: How long a user session lasts before expiring due to inactivity
descriptions.single_session_enabled: When enabled, new login will automatically logout previous sessions (1 account = 1 device)
descriptions.max_concurrent_sessions: Maximum number of active sessions per user. Set 0 for unlimited
descriptions.log_retention_days: How long activity and security logs are kept before automatic deletion. Set 0 to keep forever
descriptions.enable_cache: Store computed data temporarily to speed up the site
descriptions.cache_driver: The storage system for cached data
descriptions.cache_ttl: Default duration for cached items to remain valid
descriptions.enable_image_optimization: Automatically optimize images on upload for better performance
descriptions.enable_lazy_loading: Load images only when they enter the viewport
descriptions.enable_cdn: Serve static assets from a Content Delivery Network
descriptions.cdn_url: The base URL provided by your CDN
descriptions.max_upload_size: The maximum file size allowed for uploads
descriptions.allowed_image_types: Comma-separated list of allowed image extensions
descriptions.allowed_file_types: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions
descriptions.thumbnail_width: The width used when generating thumbnails
descriptions.thumbnail_height: The height used when generating thumbnails
descriptions.enable_watermark: Add a text watermark to images on upload
descriptions.watermark_text: The text to display on the watermark
descriptions.storage_driver: The system used to store uploaded files (local or external)
descriptions.aws_access_key_id: Your AWS IAM Access Key ID
descriptions.aws_secret_access_key: Your AWS IAM Secret Access Key
descriptions.aws_endpoint: Optional custom endpoint for S3 compatible services (MinIO, Spaces)
descriptions.google_client_id: OAuth2 Client ID from Google Cloud Console
descriptions.google_refresh_token: Long-lived refresh token for offline access
descriptions.google_folder_id: ID of the folder to store files in (optional)
descriptions.ftp_host: Hostname or IP address of the FTP server
descriptions.dropbox_authorization_token: Generated Access Token from Dropbox App Console
descriptions.maintenance_mode: Enable or disable Coming Soon / Under Maintenance mode.
descriptions.maintenance_title: The main heading on the maintenance page.
descriptions.maintenance_message: The message displayed on the maintenance page.
descriptions.maintenance_countdown_enabled: Show a live countdown timer until the site becomes live again.
descriptions.maintenance_end_time: When the maintenance is scheduled to end. The site will automatically become live after this time.
descriptions.shield_protection_mode: Proof-of-Work (PoW) security layer to deter AI scrapers and bots. 'Suspicious Traffic Only' mode minimizes friction for legitimate users.
descriptions.shield_protection_difficulty: Number of leading zeros required in the proof hash. Higher values increase bot CPU usage. Normal (4) is recommended.
descriptions.shield_log_verification_success: If enabled, successful verification attempts will be logged in the Security Journal. Default: Disabled to reduce log volume.

security.enable_reply: Allow users to reply to other comments
security.allow_guests: Allow users to comment without logging in
security.moderation_enabled: New comments require admin approval before appearing
security.guest_captcha: Require guests to solve a captcha to post
security.max_links: Maximum number of links allowed in a comment (0 for unlimited)
security.banned_words: List of words that will cause a comment to be marked as spam (JSON array)
